document_data.mainbody:
Humgoole was a Cashguard Basher in the employ of the Counting House of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Humgoole was a human man with dark skin, trimmed black beard, and short hair. As a Cashguard Basher, he wore a set of uniform plate mail armor and a helmet. Humgoole was armed with a two-handed war hammer.
In the , Cashguard Basher Humgoole was tasked with guarding and patrolling the private docks that belonged to the Counting House in the Lower City, alongside a number of fellow Cashguards and the citys steel watchers.
